subject: Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Maracanã stadium, the shrine of Brazilian soccer in Rio de Janeiro, is closed. The national sport is on hold, awaiting the start of the Pan American Games on Friday and the promise of future glory that a successful sports showcase could bring.
